# completionistv2 Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2026-01-26

## Active Technologies
- TypeScript on Next.js App Router, Node 18+ + Next.js, React, tRPC (v11), Prisma, PostgreSQL, Tailwind CSS, React Query; minimal local auth via middleware with env token (001-admin-backend)
- PostgreSQL via Prisma models (Franchise, Entry, Milestone) (001-admin-backend)

- TypeScript targeting Next.js App Router on Node 18+ + Next.js (App Router), tRPC, Prisma, PostgreSQL, Tailwind CSS, React Context for theme/accent state (001-completionist-tracker)

## Project Structure

```text
backend/
frontend/
tests/
```

## Commands

npm test && npm run lint

## Code Style

TypeScript targeting Next.js App Router on Node 18+: Follow standard conventions

## Recent Changes
- 001-admin-backend: Added TypeScript on Next.js App Router, Node 18+ + Next.js, React, tRPC (v11), Prisma, PostgreSQL, Tailwind CSS, React Query; minimal local auth via middleware with env token

- 001-completionist-tracker: Added TypeScript targeting Next.js App Router on Node 18+ + Next.js (App Router), tRPC, Prisma, PostgreSQL, Tailwind CSS, React Context for theme/accent state
